subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello Richard

    I hope this email finds you well; pardon my delayed reply, I was very
busy with work.
However I thank you for your interest in this proposal,  I am freely giving
you
full details of this transaction bearing in mind that you will not
betray me, The name of the bank i work is LA CAIXA BANK ESPAÑA, this
transaction requires utmost trust and dedication from your side since
you will be receiving the funds as the Next of Kin/Heir to Mr.
Sanchezs and will be in control of the money until I come over for my
share Regarding the sharing, I am under the belief that my sharing ratio
is accepted to you, 50/50% is a fair deal. I want you to bear one
thing in mind there is no risk involved in this transaction, It's 100%
risk free and secured once you follow my instructions and keep
everything secret between us, What i have to do is just to place your
information in our bank system as the Next of Kin/Heir to late Mr.
Sanchezs and you will apply for the claim through a lawyer here in
Spain.

Mr. Harald Sanchezs made a fixed deposit with our branch worth
€15,500,000.00 (Fifteen Million Five Hundred Thousand Euros) from his
Petroleum Corporation!

You do not have to come down here for the claim, but if you want to
come down here! no problems, the lawyer will represent you and handle
all the documentation involved, As the Audit And Accounting Manager of
my bank the secret of the bank system is under my palm, placing your
details in the system as the Next of Kin/ Heir to late Mr. Sanchez's
Harald is an easy work for me, There is no risk involved; the
transaction will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will
protect both of us from any breach of law, i am going to introduce you
to a good lawyer here in Spain who you will contact and request for
his legal services to represent you for the claim, Once this is done
The lawyer will do all the work and documentation required for the
release of the funds to you as the rightful beneficiary.

I will present you as a relation Cousin and Business partner to Mr.
Harald Sanchezs and the only proof the bank will need is your
identification, where your names are written, This is a very smooth
operation, with me in the bank it will not last more than 2 weeks and
the funds will be released to you, The information I require to
commence the process is as follows;

YOUR FULL NAMES, DATE OF BIRTH, OCCUPATION, ADDRESS AND PHONE NUMBERS,

Once I receive the above mentioned information and concludes with my
inside arrangements and changes, i will send you the contact details
of a Lawyer you shall contact for the representation, The lawyer in
question is good and specializes in such cases, His also a registered
attorney with the Central Bank of Spain which is the bank that will
handle the transfer of the funds out of the country to your bank
account, As far as my bank is concerned, I will be in control, It has
been my dream to have my own company and I believe that God has
answered my prayers by creating this opportunity. Please, remember to
treat this transaction with utmost confidentiality for our own good.

I await your urgent response.

Thank you and God bless. PLEASE TREAT AS TOP SECRET.
Regards,

Mrs. Maria Nastac Alonso
